name: Create a new restful booker & verify if the student is added

testSteps.description: When I create a new booking by providing the information firstName "Prime" lastName "prime1" totalPrice "1234" depositPaid "Yes" bookingDates "checkin: 2023-01-01, checkout: 2023-02-01" additionalNeeds "Breakfast"

children.description: Creating booking with firstName : Prime, lastName: prime1, email: 1234, totalPrice: Yes, depositPaid: [checkin: 2023-01-01, checkout: 2023-02-01], bookingDates: [Breakfast] and additionalNeeds: {6}

testSteps.description: Then I verify that the booking with "<email>" is created

When I create a new booking by providing the information firstName "Prime2" lastName "prime3" totalPrice "5678" depositPaid "Yes" bookingDates "checkin: 2023-03-01, checkout: 2023-04-01" additionalNeeds "Wi-Fi"

testSteps.description: Then I verify that the booking with "<email>" is created
